DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate effect high fat meal increase gastric pH BMS-663068 bioavailability
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect High Fat Meal Increased Gastric pH Bioavailability Extended Release Formulation BMS-663068 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed Informed Consent 2 . Target population : Healthy male female . 3 . Males females 4 . Women child bear potential ( WOCBP ) negative serum urine pregnancy test 5 . Women must breastfeed 6 . Men WOCBP must agree follow instruction contraception 1 . History chronic acute illness gastrointestinal disease 2 . Any major surgery within 4 week study drug administration 3 . Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , ECG clinical laboratory determination beyond consistent target population . 4 . History allergy HIV attachment inhibitor , famotidine high fat meal 5 . History smoking
